text:
THANJAVUR

Sastra University : National Science Day Awards presentation, D.P.Singh,Director, NAAC, Bengaluru, presents awards to distinguished scientists, Thirumalaisamudram, 9.30 a.m.

Department of Arts and Culture and Tamil Nadu Music College, Thiruvaiyaru: Mupperum Vizha, N.Subbaiyan, Collector, inaugurates, college campus, 10 a.m.

Builders’ Association of India, Thanjavur Centre : Healthcare camp, Meenakshi Hospital, 6 a.m.

PUDUKOTTAI

Sri Bhuvaneswari Avadutha Vidhya Peetam : Abishekam to Kasi Viswanathar, 7 a.m.

Sri Sudarshan Polytechnic: Sri Hayagreva Mantrapoorvaga Tharana Sarasawathi Mantra Pallava Sri Medha Dakshinamurthy Mantra homam, 9 a.m.

Mount Zion College of Engineering and Technology, Tamil Nadu Science Forum and Rotary Club of Pudukottai Central: National Science Day, painting, essay writing and poetry contests, science exhibition, 9.30 a.m.; S.Shanthi, Chief Educational Officer, distributes prizes, 2.30 p.m.

Arputha Arts and Science College: NSS special camp, Kuppakudi, 10 a.m.

NAGAPATTINAM

AVC College, Mannampandal : Convocation, K.Sekar, Director of Collegiate Education, delivers convocation address, 2 p.m.
title: engagements
